Parson Problem can be created using a tool called [http://acos.cs.hut.fi/jsparsons-generator Js-parsons Problem Generator] from [http://acos.cs.hut.fi/ ACOS Content Server]. \n\nIt Generates ACOS compatible js-parsons json-formatted problem descriptions from given input. The resulting page will give a JSON-reprsesentation of the exercise that can be hosted anywhere and linked to JSON. Additionally, a direct URL will be given that can be used to test and access the exercise.
